flawed_nl_solution:
The cafeteria can seat 15 x 10 = <<15*10=150>>150 people.
Usually, 150 x 1/10 = <<150*1/10=1500/1>>1500/1 seat are unseated.
Thus, 150 - 1500/1 = <<150-1500/1=-1350>>-1350 seats are usually taken.
#### -1350

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 1500/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
